mapper.select: select * from jc_match_bjdc_pl where ISSUE_NUM=#{issueNum} and NO_ID = #{noId}

select t.Name_J hostname,tt.Name_J guestName,aa.* from ( select l.ID_BET007,l.ISSUE_NUM,a.*,l.lottery,l.LOTTERY_NAME,d.MATCH_RESULT,IFNULL(d.conced_num,"0") concedNum from ( SELECT m.ScheduleID,M.HomeTeam hostname,m.GuestTeam guestName,m.MatchTime matchTime,s.Name_JS matchName,m.MatchState ,m.HomeScore,m.GuestScore,m.HomeHalfScore,m.GuestHalfScore,m.HomeTeamID,m.GuestTeamID from schedule m LEFT JOIN Sclass s on s.sclassID = m.SclassID where 1=1 and m.MatchTime >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and m.MatchTime <= str_to_date(#{endvDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and MatchState =-1 ) a,jc_match_lottery l,JC_MATCH_BJDCRESLUT d where a.ScheduleID = l.ID_BET007 and a.ScheduleID = d.ID_BET007 and l.LOTTERY = 'BJDC' order by l.ISSUE_NUM desc ,l.NO_ID ) aa LEFT JOIN team t on aa.HomeTeamID = t.teamid LEFT JOIN team tt on aa.GuestTeamID = tt.teamid

select count(*) from ( select l.ID_BET007,l.ISSUE_NUM,a.*,l.lottery,l.LOTTERY_NAME,d.MATCH_RESULT,IFNULL(d.conced_num,"0") concedNum from ( SELECT m.ScheduleID,M.HomeTeam hostname,m.GuestTeam guestName,m.MatchTime matchTime,s.Name_JS matchName,m.MatchState ,m.HomeScore,m.GuestScore,m.HomeHalfScore,m.GuestHalfScore,m.HomeTeamID,m.GuestTeamID from schedule m LEFT JOIN Sclass s on s.sclassID = m.SclassID where 1=1 and m.MatchTime >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and m.MatchTime <= str_to_date(#{endvDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) a,jc_match_lottery l,JC_MATCH_BJDCRESLUT d where a.ScheduleID = l.ID_BET007 and a.ScheduleID = d.ID_BET007 and l.LOTTERY = 'BJDC' order by l.ISSUE_NUM desc ,matchTime ) aa LEFT JOIN team t on aa.HomeTeamID = t.teamid LEFT JOIN team tt on aa.GuestTeamID = tt.teamid
select * from jc_match_bjdc_pl p where p.ID_BET007 = #{matchId}
